---
title: "Model Report"
format: html
params:
  tbl_coeff: "default_value"
  mod_lm: "default_value"
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(gt)
```

```{r}
params$tbl_coeff |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(x = estimate,
        y = term)
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = estimate-3*`std.error`,
      xend=estimate+3*`std.error`,
      y=term,
      yend=term)) +
  theme_bw()
```
